resources.string: Nearest public transport station to start:
Nearest public transport station to finish:

This section of the LOOP features easy walking with some extensive green stretches on entirely level ground, mostly on grass and rough footpaths. There is one stile. There are caf√©s and pubs along the route. Points of interest on this section are Bushy Park, the Diana Fountain, Waterhouse Woodland Gardens, Crane Park, the Shot Tower and Hounslow Heath.
